# The `DIDumpOptions` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Container for dump options that control which debug information will be dumped. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::DIDumpOptions</CodeBlock>
